r.s: Provides a class to decode mime messages.
r.d: Provides a class to deal with the decoding and interpreting of mime messages. This package used to be part of the Mail_Mime package, but has been split off.
r.n:
Minor Bugfix release.
Bug Fixes #----- - fix bug in getSendArray() - not handling multiple recipents #14129 - E_NOTICE fixes
Requests #12365 - Add option to also include raw attached messages patched on the request of till
